title.rendered: Plaster of Paris  False Ceiling (pop) Designing

content.rendered: Plaster of Paris is a great building material that has metamorphosed the face of contemporary interiors. The highly adaptive material comes as a dry powder which needs to be blended with water before using. Plaster of Paris is greatly being used as an effective false ceiling material finding immense application in all forms of architecture.
